articles.title: Leon Vitali, Stanley Kubrick collaborator and Barry Lyndon actor, dies aged 74 - The Guardian
articles.description: Vitali, who gave up acting to become the demanding director’s right-hand man, died in Los Angeles on Friday
articles.content:
Leon Vitali, the Barry Lyndon actor who became one of Stanley Kubricks closest associates, has died at the age of 74.
